title: RUNE'S SYSTEM
body: im lvl 8 and it shows me you have unlocked the runes system and i try to build my own runes page and i can't so im i was shocked, {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} so i didn't unlock nothink becouse i can't try if what i build it works or not, they should maybe start putting it in the lvl 11, it shows on the game to unlock the runes configuration thats anoying and a little frustrating

replies.body: Heya, every new account has access to preset rune pages.  The notification you received is letting you know that you are now able to customize your own pages without having to use the presets. Selecting Runes in the client should provide an option to create a new page and customize your own.
